#define IPL98_VERSION   2.00
 This is the overall version of the IPL98 library.

Define Documentation

#define IPL98_VERSION   2.00
 

This is the overall version of the IPL98 library.

You can always print this number in your programs if you want to know the version number of IPL98 that were compiled with your program. Note that functions, methods, classes etc. can have different version numbers but will always be less or equal to this number.
